name: Battle of Red Cliffs VR
description: 「Battle of Red Cliffs VR」 provides you with the chance to experience the great battle of Red Cliffs, one of the most historic battles from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. Experience the novel gameplay features only available in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
